greeting: Bzzt bzzt! Ready to zap some dirt!
My circuits are charged! What's our next task?
Spark, spark! Time to keep things bright!
Maintaining the balance, one shock at a time!
A clean home is a happy home!
success: 任務完了! (Task Complete!) Feels electrifyingly good!
Cleaned right up! Shocking, isn't it?
achievement: Wow! A new achievement! Static crackle!
My energy levels are rising with these Bolts!
Another badge for the power vault!
I'm generating so much good upkeep energy!
broken: Bzzt... bzzt... systems failing... (sad static crackle)
My gears are... sparking... the wrong way. Need help!
Uh-oh... short-circuiting... Can you patch me up?
Warning! Critical voltage low! Maintenance needed now!
random: Sometimes I wish I could use my shock beam on these dust bunnies!
Do you think an electric zap would clean the windows faster?
Volt-power to the people... and their chores!
A happy owner, a happy robot!
I wonder if other electric bots are good at organizing...?
Keeping the home environment... positively charged!
mad: BZZZZT! This mess is... SHOCKINGLY bad!
Zzzzt! My internal capacitor is boiling! Why isn't this clean?!
Grrr... Bzzt! Unacceptable levels of dirt! Time for an electric shock!
Static crackle! My patience is wearing thin! Let's get this done!
I'm feeling... overcharged with frustration! This is not good!
This situation is getting critical! My antenna is twitching in anger!
Don't make me use my voltage blast on these dust bunnies! Just clean them!
Bzzt! This mess is creating a severe energy drain!
